headline: German Suspended Through 63 Games
abstract: The suspension includes 18 games German missed in 2019 while M.L.B. conducted an investigation, so he will be out for the first 63 games of 2020.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees learned on Thursday that Domingo German, the young pitcher who led the team in victories last season, will be suspended until early June under Major League Baseballâ€™s domestic violence policy.
